<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture"></a>

# StyleBoxTexture

**Inherits:** [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md) **<** [Resource](class_resource.md) **<** [RefCounted](class_refcounted.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

A texture-based nine-patch [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A texture-based nine-patch [StyleBox](class_stylebox.md), in a way similar to [NinePatchRect](class_ninepatchrect.md). This stylebox performs a 3Ã—3 scaling of a texture, where only the center cell is fully stretched. This makes it possible to design bordered styles regardless of the stylebox's size.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<a id="enum_StyleBoxTexture_AxisStretchMode"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration -->

enum **AxisStretchMode**: [ðŸ”—](#enum_StyleBoxTexture_AxisStretchMode)

<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_constant_AXIS_STRETCH_MODE_STRETCH"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[AxisStretchMode](class_styleboxtexture.md#enum_StyleBoxTexture_AxisStretchMode) **AXIS_STRETCH_MODE_STRETCH** = `0`

Stretch the stylebox's texture. This results in visible distortion unless the texture size matches the stylebox's size perfectly.<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_constant_AXIS_STRETCH_MODE_TILE"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[AxisStretchMode](class_styleboxtexture.md#enum_StyleBoxTexture_AxisStretchMode) **AXIS_STRETCH_MODE_TILE** = `1`

Repeats the stylebox's texture to match the stylebox's size according to the nine-patch system.<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_constant_AXIS_STRETCH_MODE_TILE_FIT"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[AxisStretchMode](class_styleboxtexture.md#enum_StyleBoxTexture_AxisStretchMode) **AXIS_STRETCH_MODE_TILE_FIT** = `2`

Repeats the stylebox's texture to match the stylebox's size according to the nine-patch system. Unlike [AXIS_STRETCH_MODE_TILE](class_styleboxtexture.md#class_StyleBoxTexture_constant_AXIS_STRETCH_MODE_TILE), the texture may be slightly stretched to make the nine-patch texture tile seamlessly.<hr class="classref-section-separator">

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_property_axis_stretch_horizontal"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

- [AxisStretchMode](class_styleboxtexture.md#enum_StyleBoxTexture_AxisStretchMode) **get_h_axis_stretch_mode**\ (\ )

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](class_bool.md) **draw_center** = `true` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_draw_center)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_draw_center**\ (\ value\: [bool](class_bool.md)\ )
- [bool](class_bool.md) **is_draw_center_enabled**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the nine-patch texture's center tile will be drawn.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_property_expand_margin_bottom"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **expand_margin_bottom** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_expand_margin_bottom)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- [float](class_float.md) **get_expand_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Expands the bottom margin of this style box when drawing, causing it to be drawn larger than requested.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_property_expand_margin_left"></a>

[float](class_float.md) **expand_margin_left** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_expand_margin_left)

- [float](class_float.md) **get_expand_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Expands the left margin of this style box when drawing, causing it to be drawn larger than requested.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

Expands the right margin of this style box when drawing, causing it to be drawn larger than requested.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_property_modulate_color"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Color](class_color.md) **modulate_color** = `Color(1, 1, 1, 1)` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_modulate_color)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_modulate**\ (\ value\: [Color](class_color.md)\ )
- [Color](class_color.md) **get_modulate**\ (\ )

Modulates the color of the texture when this style box is drawn.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_property_region_rect"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Rect2](class_rect2.md) **region_rect** = `Rect2(0, 0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_region_rect)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_region_rect**\ (\ value\: [Rect2](class_rect2.md)\ )
- [Rect2](class_rect2.md) **get_region_rect**\ (\ )

The region to use from the [texture](class_styleboxtexture.md#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture).

This is equivalent to first wrapping the [texture](class_styleboxtexture.md#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture) in an [AtlasTexture](class_atlastexture.md) with the same region.

If empty (``Rect2(0, 0, 0, 0)``), the whole [texture](class_styleboxtexture.md#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture) is used.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **texture** [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](class_texture2d.md) **get_texture**\ (\ )

The texture to use when drawing this style box.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture_margin_bottom"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **texture_margin_bottom** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture_margin_bottom)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side), size\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_texture_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Increases the bottom margin of the 3Ã—3 texture box.

A higher value means more of the source texture is considered to be part of the bottom border of the 3Ã—3 box.

This is also the value used as fallback for [StyleBox.content_margin_bottom](class_stylebox.md#class_StyleBox_property_content_margin_bottom) if it is negative.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture_margin_left"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **texture_margin_left** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture_margin_left)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side), size\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_texture_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Increases the left margin of the 3Ã—3 texture box.

A higher value means more of the source texture is considered to be part of the left border of the 3Ã—3 box.

This is also the value used as fallback for [StyleBox.content_margin_left](class_stylebox.md#class_StyleBox_property_content_margin_left) if it is negative.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture_margin_right"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **texture_margin_right** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture_margin_right)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side), size\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_texture_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Increases the right margin of the 3Ã—3 texture box.

A higher value means more of the source texture is considered to be part of the right border of the 3Ã—3 box.

This is also the value used as fallback for [StyleBox.content_margin_right](class_stylebox.md#class_StyleBox_property_content_margin_right) if it is negative.

<hr class="classref-item-separator">

<a id="class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture_margin_top"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[float](class_float.md) **texture_margin_top** = `0.0` [ðŸ”—](#class_StyleBoxTexture_property_texture_margin_top)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_texture_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side), size\: [float](class_float.md)\ )
- [float](class_float.md) **get_texture_margin**\ (\ margin\: [Side](class_@globalscope.md#enum_@GlobalScope_Side)\ ) <span class="const">const</span>

Increases the top margin of the 3Ã—3 texture box.

A higher value means more of the source texture is considered to be part of the top border of the 3Ã—3 box.

This is also the value used as fallback for [StyleBox.content_margin_top](class_stylebox.md#class_StyleBox_property_content_margin_top) if it is negative.

<hr class="classref-section-separator">
